============
Installation
============

.. |pipenv| replace:: ``pipenv``
.. _pipenv : https://pipenv.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

.. |pip| replace:: ``pip``
.. _pip : https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/

You can install pyoneering with |pip|_ or |pipenv|_.

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install pyoneering
